overview: Newly married Jordan and Dewina has to face tragic fate. The night Jordan who should enjoy the first night, suddenly abandoned by Dewina who goes to discos just to vent his passion.  Accompanied by her friend Riska, Dewina spend the night at discotheque and drunk. At that moment comes Rico, who likes Dewina, along with three companions, Sandy, Gerry, and Dion. Rico fed Dewina with drugs until unconscious.  Rico cs then rape Dewina. Panic attack happens when they realize Dewina lifeless. Rico decides to throw Dewina so that no one knows.
title: Hantu Diskotik Kota
